description:
The Straw Hats are ready to begin the fight for Robin, but first, Luffy flashes back to memories of his childhood - and the man who made him want to become a pirate!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jump Towards the Falls! Luffy`s Feelings!
Taki ni Mukatte Tobe!! Luffy no Omoi!!
Vol au-dessus des chutes d`eau ! Les sentiments de Luffy !
滝に向かって飛べ! ルフィの想い!!
